00045   enum RealComplexType {   RealComplexType_Real             = 0,   RealComplexType_ComplexCartesian = 1,   RealComplexType_ComplexPolar     = 2,   RealComplexType_reserved3        = 3

00053   enum DataItemFormat {    DataItemFormat_SignedInt     =  0,    DataItemFormat_SignedVRT1    =  1,    DataItemFormat_SignedVRT2    =  2,    DataItemFormat_SignedVRT3    =  3,    DataItemFormat_SignedVRT4    =  4,    DataItemFormat_SignedVRT5    =  5,    DataItemFormat_SignedVRT6    =  6,    DataItemFormat_SignedIntNN   =  7, // NEW in V49.2    DataItemFormat_reserved8     =  8,    DataItemFormat_reserved9     =  9,    DataItemFormat_reserved10    = 10,    DataItemFormat_reserved11    = 11,    DataItemFormat_reserved12    = 12,    DataItemFormat_Float16       = 13, // NEW in V49.2    DataItemFormat_Float         = 14,    DataItemFormat_Double        = 15,    DataItemFormat_UnsignedInt   = 16,    DataItemFormat_UnsignedVRT1  = 17,    DataItemFormat_UnsignedVRT2  = 18,    DataItemFormat_UnsignedVRT3  = 19,    DataItemFormat_UnsignedVRT4  = 20,    DataItemFormat_UnsignedVRT5  = 21,    DataItemFormat_UnsignedVRT6  = 22,    DataItemFormat_UnsignedIntNN = 23, // NEW in V49.2    DataItemFormat_reserved24    = 24,    DataItemFormat_reserved25    = 25,    DataItemFormat_reserved26    = 26,    DataItemFormat_reserved27    = 27,    DataItemFormat_reserved28    = 28,    DataItemFormat_reserved29    = 29,    DataItemFormat_reserved30    = 30,    DataItemFormat_reserved31    = 31
00086   };
00087 
00089   inline bool DataItemFormat_isSigned (DataItemFormat form) {
00090     return ((int32_t)form) < 16;
00091   }
00092 
00094   inline int32_t DataItemFormat_getExponentBits (DataItemFormat form) {
00095     switch (form) {
00096       case DataItemFormat_SignedVRT1:   return 1;
00097       case DataItemFormat_SignedVRT2:   return 2;
00098       case DataItemFormat_SignedVRT3:   return 3;
00099       case DataItemFormat_SignedVRT4:   return 4;
00100       case DataItemFormat_SignedVRT5:   return 5;
00101       case DataItemFormat_SignedVRT6:   return 6;
00102       case DataItemFormat_UnsignedVRT1: return 1;
00103       case DataItemFormat_UnsignedVRT2: return 2;
00104       case DataItemFormat_UnsignedVRT3: return 3;
00105       case DataItemFormat_UnsignedVRT4: return 4;
00106       case DataItemFormat_UnsignedVRT5: return 5;
00107       case DataItemFormat_UnsignedVRT6: return 6;
00108       default: return -1;
00109     }
00110   }
00111 
00113   enum DataType {
00114     // XXX - why the cryptic values? Something related to StandardDataPacket implementation  DataType_Int4       = __INT64_C(0x00FFFFFA00010000),  DataType_Int8       = __INT64_C(0x00FFFFFA00020000),  DataType_Int16      = __INT64_C(0x00FFFFFA00030000),  DataType_Int32      = __INT64_C(0x00FFFFFA00040000),  DataType_Int64      = __INT64_C(0x00FFFFFA00050000),  DataType_Float      = __INT64_C(0x00FFFFFA00060000),  DataType_Double     = __INT64_C(0x00FFFFFA00070000),  DataType_UInt1      = __INT64_C(0x00FFFFFA00080000),  DataType_UInt4      = __INT64_C(0x00FFFFFA00090000),  DataType_UInt8      = __INT64_C(0x00FFFFFA000A0000),  DataType_UInt16     = __INT64_C(0x00FFFFFA000B0000),  DataType_UInt32     = __INT64_C(0x00FFFFFA000C0000),  DataType_UInt64     = __INT64_C(0x00FFFFFA000D0000),
00128     // XXX - Add half-precision float? added to end rather than insert above and shift everything below it
00130   };

00154   class PayloadFormat : public VRTObject, public HasFields {
00155     // TODO - there are no reserved bits in V49.2, which is new since V49.0
00156     //      - the bits that were reserved are now Data Item Frac Size
00157 
00158     // Since the values 0x0000000000000000 and 0x8000000000000000 are both valid and
00159     // 0xFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF is invalid, this object uses -1 as the indicator for a null payload format.
00160     private: static const int32_t NULL_VAL_HI = -1; // 0xFFFFFFFFF;   // null value for hi (-1)
00161     private: static const int32_t NULL_VAL_LO = -1; // 0xFFFFFFFFF;   // null value for lo (-1)
00162 
00163     private: int32_t hi; // high-order bits
00164     private: int32_t lo; // low-order bits
00165 
00167     public: PayloadFormat ();
00168 
00170     public: PayloadFormat (const PayloadFormat &pf);
00171 
00177     public: PayloadFormat (DataItemFormat format, int32_t size);
00178 
00185     public: PayloadFormat (RealComplexType type, DataItemFormat format, int32_t size);
00186 
00193     public: PayloadFormat (DataItemFormat format, int32_t size, int32_t fracSize);
00194 
00202     public: PayloadFormat (RealComplexType type, DataItemFormat format, int32_t size, int32_t fracSize);
00203 
00208     public: PayloadFormat (DataType dataType, RealComplexType realComplex=RealComplexType_Real);
00209 
00223     public: PayloadFormat (bool procEfficient, RealComplexType type, DataItemFormat format,
00224                            bool repeating, int32_t eventTagSize, int32_t chanTagSize, int32_t fieldSize,
00225                            int32_t itemSize, int32_t repeatCount, int32_t vectorSize, int32_t fracSize=0);
00226 
00231     public: inline virtual bool isNullValue () const {
00232       return (hi == NULL_VAL_HI)
00233           && (lo == NULL_VAL_LO);
00234     }
00235 
00240     private: inline virtual void clearNull () {
00241       if (isNullValue())
00242         hi = lo = 0;
00243     }
00244 
00246     public: PayloadFormat (int64_t bits);
00247 
00248     public: virtual string toString () const;
00249 
00250     using VRTObject::equals;
00251     public: virtual bool equals (const VRTObject &o) const;
00252 
00256     public: inline bool isValid () const {
00257       return (getValid() == "");
00258     }
00259 
00264     public: virtual string getValid () const;
00265 
00267     public: inline int64_t getBits () const {
00268       return (((int64_t)hi) << 32) | (((int64_t)lo) & __INT64_C(0xFFFFFFFF));
00269     }
00270 
00272     public: inline void setBits (int64_t bits) {
00273       // Note: previously reserved bits were forced to 0, but those bits are now DataItemFracSize
00274       //hi = ((int32_t)(bits >> 32)) & 0xFFFF0FFF;
00275       hi = (int32_t)(bits >> 32);
00276       lo = (int32_t)bits;
00277     }
00278 
00282     public: inline bool isProcessingEfficient () const {
00283       int32_t mask = 0x80000000;
00284       return ((hi & mask) == 0);
00285     }
00286 
00290     public: inline void setProcessingEfficient (bool val) {
00291       clearNull();
00292       int32_t mask = 0x80000000;
00293       int32_t set  = (val)? 0 : mask;
00294       hi = (set | (hi & ~mask));
00295     }
00296 
00300     public: inline RealComplexType getRealComplexType () const {
00301       int32_t mask = 0x60000000;
00302       int32_t val  = (hi & mask) >> 29;
00303       return (RealComplexType)val;
00304     }
00305 
00310     public: inline void setRealComplexType (RealComplexType val) {
00311       clearNull();
00312       int32_t mask = 0x60000000;
00313       int32_t set  = ((int32_t)val) << 29;
00314       hi = (set | (hi & ~mask));
00315     }
00316 
00323     public: DataType getDataType () const;
00324 
00330     public: void setDataType (DataType type);
00331 
00335     public: inline bool isComplex () const {
00336       return (getRealComplexType() != RealComplexType_Real);
00337     }
00338 
00342     public: inline bool isSigned () const {
00343       return (getDataItemFormat() < 16);
00344     }
00345 
00349     public: inline DataItemFormat getDataItemFormat () const {
00350       int32_t mask = 0x1F000000;
00351       int32_t val  = (hi & mask) >> 24;
00352       return (DataItemFormat)val;
00353     }
00354 
00359     public: inline void setDataItemFormat (DataItemFormat val) {
00360       clearNull();
00361       int32_t mask = 0x1F000000;
00362       int32_t set  = ((int32_t)val) << 24;
00363       hi = (set | (hi & ~mask));
00364     }
00365 
00369     public: inline bool isRepeating () const {
00370       int32_t mask = 0x00800000;
00371       return ((hi & mask) != 0);
00372     }
00373 
00377     public: inline void setRepeating (bool val) {
00378       clearNull();
00379       int32_t mask = 0x00800000;
00380       int32_t set  = (val)? mask : 0;
00381       hi = (set | (hi & ~mask));
00382     }
00383 
00387     public: inline int32_t getEventTagSize () const {
00388       int32_t mask = 0x00700000;
00389       int32_t val  = (hi & mask) >> 20;
00390       return val;
00391     }
00392 
00397     public: inline void setEventTagSize (int32_t val) {
00398       if ((val < 0) || (val > 7)) {
00399         throw VRTException("Value (%d) not in range of 0..7", val);
00400       }
00401       clearNull();
00402       int32_t mask = 0x00700000;
00403       int32_t set  = val << 20;
00404       hi = (set | (hi & ~mask));
00405     }
00406 
00410     public: inline int getChannelTagSize () const {
00411       int32_t mask = 0x000F0000;
00412       int32_t val  = (hi & mask) >> 16;
00413       return val;
00414     }
00415 
00420     public: inline void setChannelTagSize (int32_t val) {
00421       if ((val < 0) || (val > 15)) {
00422         throw VRTException("Value (%d) not in range of 0..15", val);
00423       }
00424       clearNull();
00425       int32_t mask = 0x000F0000;
00426       int32_t set  = val << 16;
00427       hi = (set | (hi & ~mask));
00428     }
00429 
00433     public: inline int32_t getDataItemFracSize () const {
00434       int32_t mask = 0x0000F000;
00435       int32_t val  = (hi & mask) >> 12;
00436       return val;
00437     }
00438 
00443     public: inline void setDataItemFracSize (int32_t val) {
00444       if ((val < 0) || (val > 15)) {
00445         throw VRTException("Value (%d) not in range of 0..15", val);
00446       }
00447       clearNull();
00448       int32_t mask = 0x0000F000;
00449       int32_t set  = val << 12;
00450       hi = (set | (hi & ~mask));
00451     }
00452 
00456     public: inline int32_t getItemPackingFieldSize () const {
00457       int32_t mask = 0x00000FC0;
00458       int32_t val  = (hi & mask) >> 6;
00459       return val+1;
00460     }
00461 
00466     public: inline void setItemPackingFieldSize (int32_t val) {
00467       if ((val < 1) || (val > 64)) {
00468         throw VRTException("Value (%d) not in range of 1..64", val);
00469       }
00470       clearNull();
00471       int32_t mask = 0x00000FC0;
00472       int32_t set  = (val-1) << 6;
00473       hi = (set | (hi & ~mask));
00474     }
00475 
00479     public: inline int32_t getDataItemSize () const {
00480       int32_t mask = 0x0000003F;
00481       int32_t val  = (hi & mask);
00482       return val+1;
00483     }
00484 
00489     public: inline void setDataItemSize (int32_t val) {
00490       if ((val < 1) || (val > 64)) {
00491         throw VRTException("Value (%d) not in range of 1..64", val);
00492       }
00493       clearNull();
00494       int32_t mask = 0x0000003F;
00495       int32_t set  = (val-1);
00496       hi = (set | (hi & ~mask));
00497     }
00498 
00502     public: inline int32_t getRepeatCount () const {
00503       return (0x0000FFFF&(lo >> 16))+1;
00504     }
00505 
00510     public: inline void setRepeatCount (int32_t val) {
00511       if ((val < 1) || (val > 65536)) {
00512         throw VRTException("Value (%d) not in range of 1..65536", val);
00513       }
00514       clearNull();
00515       lo = (((val-1) << 16) | (lo & 0x0000FFFF));
00516     }
00517 
00521     public: inline int32_t getVectorSize () const {
00522       return (lo & 0x0000FFFF)+1;
00523     }
00524 
00529     public: inline void setVectorSize (int32_t val) {
00530       if ((val < 1) || (val > 65536)) {
00531         throw VRTException("Value (%d) not in range of 1..65536", val);
00532       }
00533       clearNull();
00534       lo = ((val-1) | (lo & 0xFFFF0000));
00535     }
00536 
00538     // Implement HasFields
00540     public: virtual int32_t   getFieldCount () const;
00541     public: virtual string    getFieldName  (int32_t id) const;
00542     public: virtual ValueType getFieldType  (int32_t id) const;
00543     public: virtual Value*    getField      (int32_t id) const __attribute__((warn_unused_result));
00544     public: virtual void      setField      (int32_t id, const Value* val);
00545   };
